title: Chickpea production restored through upscaling crowdsourcing winner varieties and planting date adjustments in the Ada'a district, East Shoa zone, Ethiopia
content:
Publication date: 15 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Dejene K. Mengistu, Hailu Terefe, Tadesse Teshome, Talila Garamu, Basazen Fantahun Lakew, Carlo Fadda
